Analyses developed during the doctorate of Vincyane Badouard at AMAP on canopy and undrestory species light niche in French Guiana.

**vbadouard** includes:

-   `residuals.qmd` analyses on Binomial pseudo-residuals
-   `vincyane.qmd` analyses on background data
-   `vincyane2.qmd` analyses on parameters 3-D space
-   `vincyane3.qmd` analyses on rational behind the model

Contact: vincyane.badouard@gmail.com; geraldine.derroire@cirad.fr
